tiles.name: Western Foothills
tiles.description: Rocky terrain with sparse vegetation, marking the beginning of the mountain range. Temperate climate, but prone to sudden thunderstorms.

tiles.name: Winding Ascent
tiles.description: A steep, rocky path leading higher into the mountains. Hidden paths may exist. Notable for its wind-swept areas.

tiles.name: Lightning-Struck Peak
tiles.description: One of the higher peaks, frequently struck by lightning during thunderstorms. The area shows signs of arcane infusion from past strikes.

tiles.name: Scree Slope
tiles.description: A treacherous scree slope leading down from the higher peaks. Dangerous cliffs are a constant threat.

tiles.name: Hidden Cave Entrance
tiles.description: The concealed entrance to a cave system, possibly leading to Zephyr's hideout. The entrance is located within a rocky outcrop.

tiles.name: The Tallest Peak
tiles.description: The highest peak in the range, often shrouded in mist and snow. A location affected by ancient magic.

tiles.name: Valley Entrance
tiles.description: Marks the transition to the forest in the valley below. The trees offer some shelter from the wind. The valley holds rare alchemical ingredients.

tiles.name: The Whispering Crags
tiles.description: A forest surrounding tall, whispering crags, known for its volatile and mysterious atmosphere. These peaks are part of the larger mountain range.

tiles.name: Valley Bottom
tiles.description: The heart of the valley, dense with trees and potentially hiding ancient ruins or Zephyr's secondary lab/library.
